title: The Poet WILL Be Televised! Open Mic and Jam Session
desc: The REC brings you the hypest open mic in New York!! Held at Funkadelic Studios!? The Poet WILL Be Televised! Out with the old stale quiet open mics for poetry! This is a jam session for poets and the poetic! Create beautiful music with #ThePoetWILLBeTelevised trio in a completely fresh, intimate atmosphere filled with art and love! ?Each month we film and broadcast the event live! Come be a part of the action! Hosted by lyricist,  Baxter P. Wordsworth ?and the UnNamed Band! If you?re a musician, we invite you to sit in as well!? Produced by The REC, an event planning company dedicated to promoting quality music and community through hip-hop, rnb, and poetry events. This open mic loves poets but is open to ALL types of performing artists - comedians, musicians, storytellers, singers, poets, fiction/nonfiction writers, playwrights, performance artists, dancers, . . . . whatever! Sign-up starts @ 830pm! $5 in advance! $10 at the door! A warm, supportive community of artists! A great place to network and create! ***** When: 2nd Wednesday of each month! Where:? Funkadelic Studios ? 209 West 40th Street 5th Floor New York, NY 10018 Visit http://thereclife.org for more information and for past episodes! For music from the show visit http://soundcloud.com/thereclife
